string-array.name: product_details
string-array.item: Detail paint brushes for artists and model makers, watercolor, acrylic, oil paints, etc. Soft and polished wooden handles give you more control of the brush while painting. It is secure to the handle with the metal part well attached to the wood and the brush hair, so there is no wiggling. Easy to clean and brushes hold their shape after cleaning. Triangular grip handle to give holding precision.

Detail paint brushes for artists and model makers, watercolor, acrylic, oil paints, etc. Soft and polished wooden handles give you more control of the brush while painting. It is secure to the handle with the metal part well attached to the wood and the brush hair, so there is no wiggling. Easy to clean and brushes hold their shape after cleaning. Triangular grip handle to give holding precision.

Made from 100 percent pure cotton, 140lb/300gsm heavyweight watercolor papers, acid-free and chlorine-free, pH-neutral and archival, durable and strong enough for whether wet, dry or mixed media painting, and less likely to curl or warp

Made from 100 perecent pure cotton, 140lb/300gsm heavyweight watercolor papers, acid-free and chlorine-free, pH-neutral and archival, durable and strong enough for whether wet, dry or mixed media painting, and less likely to curl or warp
Set of 12 assorted shades in 9 ml tube Confirms to safety standard ASTM- AP certification Best result can be seen on canvas and Oil Sketching Paper
Set of 12 assorted shades in 9 ml tube Confirms to safety standard ASTM- AP certification Best result can be seen on canvas and Oil Sketching Paper
